Primary Contact: Lynda Bartie, Vice President; Phone: 1.800.267.7053 ext 5; Email: lynda@paladin-disability.ca
Service Details: - Provides services of a medical liaison, a legal advisor and a tax liaison to assist those with disabilities through the application process for Federal Disability Tax Credit to maximize their chances of success- Please call for to arrange a free assessment
How to Apply: Please call or visit the website
Cost: Service ; Fees are contingent upon your successful DTC application * if you are not successful, we don't get paid and that includes disbursements * our percentage contingency fee (20-33%) is dependent upon the complexity of your application, your specific tax and disability circumstances and is spelled out clearly in your Agreement * also does pro-bono (without charge) work in cases of proven financial hardship
